questions.questionTitle: What is the main purpose of the conversation?
Why can't the woman meet the man on Monday?
What will the woman probably do next?

script:
� So, the 20th won't work for you. How about something the following week?
� That would be the week of the 23rd. Let's see... I have time on Monday afternoon and Wednesday morning. Does either of those work for you?
� Monday doesn't; I'll be out of town. Wednesday, later in the morning would. Say, 11:30?
� OK, 11:30 Wednesday. Where?
